0.text: Pick up floorlamp, move floorlamp to be close to the sofa.

1.text: Pick up floorlamp, move floorlamp to be close to the shelf.

2.text: Pull the floorlamp to be close to the sofa.

3.text: Pull the floorlamp to be close to the shelf.

4.text: Lift the table, move the table to be close to the table.

5.text: Push the table to be close to the shelf.

6.text: Pull the table to be close to the countertop.

7.text: Lift the chair, move the chair to be close to the table.

8.text: Pull the chair to be close to the table.

9.text: Lift a box, move the box and put down on the table.

10.text: Lift a box, move the box and put down on the countertop.

11.text: Lift a box, move the box and place it under the table.

12.text: Push the box to be next to the countertop.

13.text: Lift a monitor, move the monitor and put down on the table.

14.text: Lift a monitor, move the monitor and put down on the floor in front of the tv-screen.

15.text: Lift a trashcan, move the trashcan to be close to the shelf.

16.text: Lift a trashcan, move the trashcan to be close to the refrigerator.
